page.title: 10LEISURE AND RECREATION
page.content: My name is Andrew Broadhead.I spend a lot of my time making songs up with my brother.I watch T.V.,mainly Grandstand,cartoons and space films.I like Starwars.I watch a lot of video films.Sometimes my brother and I go round the house playing tig or bouncing on Mum's bed and pretending we and pretending we are pop stars and someone is interviewing us.I go to Church and act in plays and sing solos.I play football at Simon's and at football practice,which is held on a Saturday at school.I am also a cub. The cubs I go to is in Barugh Green,Barnsley. My favourite hobby is woodwork.I have lots of tools-an electric drill , hammers and four different types of saw.I get a do it yourself magazine every fortnight to improve my knowledge.By Matthew Helm,aged 11.
